20110110130814.000|20110110130816.000|TR0|law enforcement source tells us that he

20110110130819.000|20110110130821.000|TR0|weeks ago and that he had to try two 
20110110130821.000|20110110130823.000|TR0|different stores after he was turned down

20110110130825.000|20110110130827.000|TR0|"behavior."

20110110130832.000|20110110130834.000|TR0|motive, Pima County Sheriff Clarence 
20110110130834.000|20110110130836.000|TR0|Dupnik suggests that the political climate

20110110131818.000|20110110131820.000|TR0|LEMOLE:  What we do is we'll ask her to 
20110110131820.000|20110110131822.000|TR0|carry on a series of simple commands, show 
20110110131822.000|20110110131824.000|TR0|me a thumb, show me two fingers, wiggle 
20110110131824.000|20110110131826.000|TR0|your toes.  And if she's able to do that, 
20110110131826.000|20110110131829.000|TR0|it implies several that centers in the 
20110110131829.000|20110110131831.000|TR0|brain are working.  Everything from 
20110110131831.000|20110110131833.000|TR0|literally hearing the sound to processing 
20110110131833.000|20110110131835.000|TR0|it to deciphering it to then carrying out 
20110110131835.000|20110110131838.000|TR0|the command and passing that information 
20110110131838.000|20110110131840.000|TR0|on to the parts of the brain that control 
20110110131840.000|20110110131842.000|TR0|the body.  Not only do those each of those 
20110110131842.000|20110110131844.000|TR0|centers have to work, but they have to 
20110110131844.000|20110110131847.000|TR0|communicate with one another.
